summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of XIMI'S AUTO REPAIR website. All major features working correctly including navigation, phone links, business information display, mobile responsiveness, and interactive components.

ui_bugs.issue: Custom Select components (shadcn/ui) require specific interaction patterns for automated testing
ui_bugs.note: Form validation works correctly, dropdowns are functional but need custom interaction for testing

passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section, 24/7 badge, 20% OFF promo
Navigation works between all pages (Home, Services, Specials, Book Now, Contact)
Phone number (312) 533-6377 clickable with tel: links throughout site
Services page shows Auto Repair and Car Wash service cards
Book Appointment form has all required fields with validation
Specials page shows 20% OFF featured promo
Contact page shows business info and Google Maps embed
Sticky call button appears on mobile viewport
Live chat widget appears on desktop and functions correctly
Before/After gallery works with toggle and navigation
Trust bar shows all indicators (ASE-Certified, Same-Day Service, Honest Pricing, Local Chicago)
Mobile navigation with hamburger menu works
All phone links use correct tel:+13125336377 format
